summary:
AI predicts Islamic Coin price for the end of 2023 - Following its launch on the cryptocurrency trading platform KuCoin, Islamic Coin (ISML) has attracted the world’s attention as a cryptocurrency that aims at onboarding over 1.8 billion Muslims worldwide into digital finance.

 Islamic Coin: Clearing the air on a launch marred by mistaken identity - In a world where every cryptocurrency project tells a unique story, Islamic Coin [ISLM] seems to have found itself caught in between being identified as a legit project with distinct fundamentals and another coin masquerading as the real ISLM.
